Contact

GitHub

The easiest way to contact me, is through GitHub.

Fork the projekt:

  • Font branch: master
  • Site branch: gh-pages

...or file an issue. Please use the gh-pages label for issues on the page.

Elsewhere

Otherwise, you can send me an eMail or contact me via:

  • twitter: @pfefferle
  • google+: +MatthiasPfefferle

...or chat with me at the #microformats or #indieweb irc channels.

WebMentions

This site supports WebMentions. That means, that you can can write a comment on your own site and simply ping http://pfefferle.github.io/openwebicons/.

The WebMentions are powered by VoxPellis awesome WebMention Service!

Tweet

Built with love and passion by Matthias Pfefferle.

The site is hosted on GitHub, if you find a typo or if you think "this might sound good in german, but you can't translate it word by word",
feel free to file an issue or to fork and fix it... Thanks :)
